DOC.brief_summary: Dose escalation study: 3 dose groups. 5 patients in each dose group, then 15 more patients in "best" group. 3 vaccinations in volunteers, at 0 6 and 16 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1B Study of RiVax, a Vaccine to Prevent the Toxic Effects of Ricin
DOC.detailed_description: Final report was submitted to Dr. Karen Russell at FDA, Rockville on September 26, 2012.
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteers aged 1831, m or f immunodeficiency pregnant chronic disease parental IgG abnormal labs drug use hiv hep c hep b
